Table.Name: SystemStatus
Table.Description: Special values that can be calculated ad-hoc by Infomedia or supplied by Protran

Column.Name: Date
Column.Description: System date provided by Protran, but ad-hoc calculated in Infomedia as well

Type.description: Values admitted: TEXT, MEDIA or HIDDEN (case insensitive)

Addressing.description: Values admitted: DIRECT or INDIRECT (case insensitive)

Column.Name: Time
Column.Description: System time provided by Protran, but ad-hoc calculated in Infomedia as well

Type.description: Values admitted: TEXT, MEDIA or HIDDEN (case insensitive)

Addressing.description: Values admitted: DIRECT or INDIRECT (case insensitive)

Column.Name: RemotePC
Column.Description: Status of the remote PC (board computer)

Type.description: Values admitted: TEXT, MEDIA or HIDDEN (case insensitive)

Addressing.description: Values admitted: DIRECT or INDIRECT (case insensitive)

Column.Name: StopRequestedState
Column.Description: Set to 1 when stop was requested, otherwise 0

Type.description: Values admitted: TEXT, MEDIA or HIDDEN (case insensitive)

Addressing.description: Values admitted: DIRECT or INDIRECT (case insensitive)

Column.Name: DoorStatus
Column.Description: Status of the door: 0 = closed; 1 = open

Type.description: Values admitted: TEXT, MEDIA or HIDDEN (case insensitive)

Addressing.description: Values admitted: DIRECT or INDIRECT (case insensitive)

Table.Name: SystemConfiguration
Table.Description: Special values that are supplied by Infomedia at start-up

Column.Name: VersionNumber
Column.Description: Version number of Infomedia, available only in Infomedia 2.0 and above

Type.description: Values admitted: TEXT, MEDIA or HIDDEN (case insensitive)

Addressing.description: Values admitted: DIRECT or INDIRECT (case insensitive)

Column.Name: DirectXDetails
Column.Description: Details about DirectX (e.g. version number), available only in Infomedia 2.0 and above

Type.description: Values admitted: TEXT, MEDIA or HIDDEN (case insensitive)

Addressing.description: Values admitted: DIRECT or INDIRECT (case insensitive)

Type.description: Values admitted: TEXT, MEDIA or HIDDEN (case insensitive)

Addressing.description: Values admitted: DIRECT or INDIRECT (case insensitive)

Type.description: Values admitted: TEXT, MEDIA or HIDDEN (case insensitive)

Addressing.description: Values admitted: DIRECT or INDIRECT (case insensitive)

Column.Name: UserName
Column.Description: Name of the user who triggered the build

Type.description: Values admitted: TEXT, MEDIA or HIDDEN (case insensitive)

Addressing.description: Values admitted: DIRECT or INDIRECT (case insensitive)

Type.description: Values admitted: TEXT, MEDIA or HIDDEN (case insensitive)

Addressing.description: Values admitted: DIRECT or INDIRECT (case insensitive)

Column.Name: UserName
Column.Description: Name of the user who triggered the build

Type.description: Values admitted: TEXT, MEDIA or HIDDEN (case insensitive)

Addressing.description: Values admitted: DIRECT or INDIRECT (case insensitive)
